mapper.select: WITH RECURSIVE CTE AS ( SELECT 1 AS LEVEL , CD_ID , CD_NM , SUPI_CD_ID , USE_YN , ORDR FROM TC_COM_CD WHERE SUPI_CD_ID = '0000000000' UNION ALL SELECT 1 + LEVEL AS LEVEL , A.CD_ID , A.CD_NM , A.SUPI_CD_ID , A.USE_YN , A.ORDR FROM TC_COM_CD A , CTE B WHERE A.SUPI_CD_ID = B.CD_ID ), CODE_LIST AS ( SELECT LEVEL AS lvl , CD_ID AS id , CD_NM AS text , CASE WHEN SUPI_CD_ID = '0000000000' THEN '#' ELSE SUPI_CD_ID END AS parent , USE_YN , ORDR , 'folder' AS folder FROM CTE ) SELECT * FROM CODE_LIST ORDER BY lvl asc, ordr asc
